004package mkt.model;
005
006import java.util.Arrays;
007import mkt.Model;
008
009/** Exponential average model */
010public class Ea2 {
011  /**
012   * Constructor.
013   * @return InvModel
014   */
015  public static Model mk () {
016    return new Model(
017      "ME2",
018      "Media móvil exponencial (2)",
019      new String[]{"Días", "Banda"},
020      new int[]{Model.DAY_PARAM, Model.PERC_PARAM},
021      (closes, params) -> {
022        int days = (int)(params[0] + 0.4);
023        double strip = params[1];
024        double stripUp = 1 + strip;
025        double stripDown = 1 - strip;
026        double[] cls0 = closes[0];
027        int ndates = closes.length;
028        int ncos = cls0.length;
029
030        double[][] allRefs = new double[ndates][ncos];
031
032        boolean[] isSolds = new boolean[ncos];
033        Arrays.fill(isSolds, false);
034        double[] refs = new double[ncos];
035        Arrays.fill(refs, 0);
036        double[] avgs = new double[ncos];
037        Arrays.fill(avgs, 0);
038
039        for (int idate = 0; idate < ndates; ++idate) {
040          double[] closesR = closes[idate];
041          for (int ico = 0; ico < ncos; ++ico) {
042            double c = closesR[ico];
043            if (idate < days) {
044              avgs[ico] += c;
045              refs[ico] = c * stripDown;
046            } else if (idate == days) {
047              double avg = avgs[ico] / days;
048              double newAvg = avg + (c - avg) / days;
049              avgs[ico] = newAvg;
050
051              if (c <= newAvg) {
052                isSolds[ico] = true;
053                refs[ico] = newAvg * stripUp;
054              } else {
055                refs[ico] = newAvg * stripDown;
056              }
057            } else {
058              double rf = refs[ico];
059              double avg = avgs[ico];
060              double newAvg = avg + (c - avg) / days;
061              avgs[ico] = newAvg;
062
063              if (isSolds[ico]) {
064                if (c > rf) {
065                  isSolds[ico] = false;
066                  refs[ico] = newAvg * stripDown;
067                } else {
068                  double newRf = newAvg * stripUp;
069                  if (newRf < rf) refs[ico] = newRf;
070                  else refs[ico] = rf;
071                }
072              } else {
073                if (c < rf) {
074                  isSolds[ico] = true;
075                  refs[ico] = newAvg * stripUp;
076                } else {
077                  double newRf = newAvg * stripDown;
078                  if (newRf > rf) refs[ico] = newRf;
079                  else refs[ico] = rf;
080                }
081              }
082            }
083          }
084          allRefs[idate] = Arrays.copyOf(refs, ncos);
085        }
086        return allRefs;
087      }
088    );
089  }
090}
